The project team member will also be provided with higher training on SAP for different sectors (like I'm looking after "indirect purchasing" issue in this project).
projects.title: SHAPE Bangladesh of SAP

projects.description:
ERP system upgradation (Upgraded version of SAP for Sandoz Division, Novartis)

SHAPE is the name of the global program within Sandoz, that implemented SAP in 39 countries, involving about 9,100 users. It's a joint initiative between business functions and IT that changes our way of working and improves & harmonizes key business processes in Finance, Supply Chain, Purchasing and Reporting (Compliance).

The program name emphasizes:
• the aim to support business processes
• the ambition to create a harmonized business and system framework which also contributes to the integration of the former companies
• the opportunity to actively build a common Sandoz system environment and hence SHAPE our common future
projects.title: SHAPE Project

projects.description: The Sandoz SHAPE (Sandoz Harmonized Process in ERP) program aimed to transform a fragmented enterprise resource planning (ERP) environment to a globally harmonized single SAP instance that supported the business across all functions. SHAPE is designed to support more than 8500 end users, working in 28 countries, covering 96% of 3rd party sales worldwide. The new integrated ERP system supports compliance with external requirements like SOX or GxP and is fully in line with Novartis Group Finance and Reporting requirements.
